forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
